column1: 說　　明： 1.失業給付於民國88年開辦，92年起改列就業保險給付項目。
column6: Note： 1.Unemployment benefits" implemented in 1999 and had been included in the coverage of Employment Insurance from 2003."

column1: 3.103年5月30日修正生效之勞保條例規定，勞保生育給付標準由30日提高為60日，雙生以上按比例增給。
column6: 3.After the amendments for Labor Insurance Act on May 30, 2014, the payment standard for maternity benefits has been raised
from 30 days' pay to 60 days'. Benefits for multiple births are multiplied by the number of babies born.
